name: REAL Bobcat Calls - Bobcat Hunting - Bobcat Sounds
name_original: REAL Bobcat Calls - Bobcat Hunting - Bobcat Sounds
description:
Want affordable bobcat hunting calls? The BobcatPro electronic bobcat calls caller app provides you REAL bobcat hunting calls at your fingertips. These bobcat calls are clear, crisp and recorded from REAL bobcats. 11 unique bobcat hunting soundtracks included. Connect the app to your speaker and amplifier system to play the bobcat hunting calls loud.

FEATURES:
- 8 bobcat hunting calls
- Effective, realistic and clear bobcat calls
- Bluetooth compatible to sync to a Bluetooth speaker
- Bobcat hunting can play in the background of your phone allowing you to text, take pictures and surf the internet without disrupting the bobcat calling sounds
- The soundtracks allow you to set the bobcat calls and focus on bobcat hunting
- Connect to your speaker system with audio cables or Bluetooth (cables not included)
- No more forgetting to grab your MP3 player or memory cards, you always have your phone with you
- E-Calling audio for calling bobcats at a fraction of the cost of purchasing multiple soundtracks and memory cards separately

Soundtracks included in "BobcatPro"
- Bobcat Growls
- Kitten Meow/Distress
- Vole/Rodent Squeak
- Woodpecker Distress
- Rabbit Distress
- Mouse Squeaker
- Rat Distress
- Fawn Distress


Download BobcatPro and start having bobcat hunting success today!
